J

journal - Variable in class org.teamfarce.mirch.GameSnapshot
Holds the journal associated with this state.
Journal - Class in org.teamfarce.mirch
The Journal stores relevant information to the players progress through the game.

JournalScreen - Class in org.teamfarce.mirch.screens
